item.title: Java Get All Superclasses of a Class using Apache Commons Lang
item.description: This Java tutorial shows you how to get a list of all superclasses of a given Class object in Java using Apache Commons Lang library. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to add Apache Commons Lang 3 library to your Java project To use the Apache Commons Lang 3 library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. implementation 'org.apache.commons:commons-lang3:3.12.0' To use the Apache Commons Lang 3 library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.
